Reference

Build

Build each component of the site.

init_site()

Initialise the site

build_articles() build_article()

Build articles

build_home()

Build home page

build_news()

Build news section

build_reference() build_reference_index()

Build reference section

build_site()

Build pkgdown website

build_tutorials()

Build tutorials

preview_site()

Open site in browser

Templates

template_navbar() template_reference() template_articles()

Generate YAML templates

render_page() data_template()

Render page with template

Helpers

autolink_html()

Automatic link references and articles in an HTML package

clean_site()

Clean site

as_pkgdown()

Generate pkgdown data structure

in_pkgdown()

Determine if code is executed by pkgdown

Regression tests

test-dont

Test case: don't

test-figures

Test case: figures

test-links

Test case: links

test-lists

Test case: lists

test-params

Test case: params
